features: INSULATED SPORTS WATER BOTTLE: Goodbye sweat! The narrow mouth double wall insulation makes the Iron Flask sweat-free! It keeps your drink COLD for up to 24 hours, and HOT for up to 12 hours. *NOTE: ONLY the 12 Oz, 16 Oz, 20 Oz & 24 Oz fit in cupholders*

VERSATILE 3-LID DESIGN: The Iron Flask boasts a trio of 100% leak-proof lids – the patented Straw Lid for easy sipping, the convenient Flip Lid, and the carry-friendly Handle Lid. Tailor your hydration experience for any activity!
18/8 PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL: The Iron Flask is made of 18/8 Stainless steel that is 100% BPA free and non-toxic. It will never leave a metal taste or rust. HAND WASH ONLY WITH SOAPY HOT WATER!

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: The powder coat exterior finish is a classic. It assures that you stand out with a very durable and elegant bottle. Our logo is now LASER ENGRAVED to assure the highest quality as well.

THE ULTIMATE LIFESTYLE GIFT: Choose a color that speaks to your friends and family to create the perfect, personalized gift! Great for the outdoor or gym enthusiast that will enjoy a memorable product they'll remember, & due to its durability will stand the test of time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it now
reviews.reviewText: Update: After a full year of daily use and abuse by a 9 year old this water bottle is still amazing! There are a few dings/dents on the bottom of the bottle that in no way effect it’s performance and since my son didn’t want to use the silicone boot that Iron Flask offers I totally expected some damage would occur to the base. This bottle has been tossed around, carried in the outside backpack pocket (then the backpack gets tossed to the floor), dropped, knocked off of school desks and lunch tables, etc. and is still in perfectly usable condition. I am honestly amazed at how well it’s held up and the length of time it keeps drinks cold. 4th grade has started now and we had 100 degree weather all week with no air conditioning in the classroom. I put a few ice cubes in the Iron Flask and sent him to school. I forgot to wash it when he got home and the next morning when I opened the bottle there were still ice cubes in it! Still no leakage, the straw and lid are in perfect condition (although I did order a backup lid and straw just for convenience so I always have a clean one if we are rushing in the morning but that’s definitely not a necessity. Last year we used what was provided and were just fine. It comes with 2 straws anyway but we never needed to switch to the second one. My son still loves the color, performance and ease of use of the iron flask. When I asked if he wanted a new water bottle for the new school year he said he absolutely did not! He is as happy with the iron flask as I am.I bought this water bottle for my 3rd grader at the start of the school year. He wanted a blue ombré water bottle in stainless steel with a straw. I must have read 100 reviews before I chose this one and I’m so glad I picked it. It came nicely packaged with multiple straws, various lids (chug/straw depending on preference, and some cute sticker labels that can be placed on the bottle if you choose) as well as a warranty code. I did register the warranty on the Iron Flask website just to be safe. He’s been using it for about 3 months and it still looks brand new. Considering he’s an 8 year old boy and lugs it around in a backpack that gets tossed on the ground, drops the bottle on the floor, etc. I expected some damage by this point (from previous experience even with more expensive high end brand water bottles) but it’s still in perfect condition. I didn’t purchase the extra silicone boot for the bottom or a neoprene cover or any extra protection so it would easily fit in his lunchbox pocket or backpack side pocket and I’m glad because it wasn’t necessary. No dents, dings or paint chipping. I do hand wash it. The most impressive feature is how cold it keeps the water. It was a week of 90 degree days and I had filled the bottle with cold water and just a few ice cubes around 7am on a Friday. After a 4 day weekend I realized I had forgotten to wash his water bottle for the upcoming school week and when I opened it the ice cubes were still frozen! I couldn’t believe it. Especially since his backpack spent all day Saturday in our garage (which doesn’t have air conditioning or any kind of climate control). I will definitely purchasing Iron Flask products in the future! I paid full price for this item (no discount, no free trial/sample, etc. and no request from the company for a review). This is my honest opinion as a consumer who relies on reviews to purchase good quality products. If you’re on the fence, buy it!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My one and only flask
reviews.reviewText: I love my bottle. I really like the three different tops and the extra straw it comes with it. My favorite top is the straw since it’s easy to carry and easier to drink out of. Keep my water super cold and I like how much it holds. My husband has dropped it quite a few times so it’s pretty beat up now but still very sturdy! I ended up buying him one too and he loved his! Weirdly enough, mine “developed” some weird stains on the outside but never figured out how that even happened. It’s not as nice looking from when I first bought it but still my favorite flask! I use it every day! And its dishwasher safe, extra nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect flask!
reviews.reviewText: The Iron Flask is a reliable and stylish metal water bottle that combines durability with sleek design. Crafted with high-quality stainless steel, it ensures long-lasting use. Its double-wall insulation keeps beverages hot or cold for extended periods. The wide mouth allows for easy filling and cleaning, while the leak-proof lid adds convenience to your on-the-go lifestyle. With various sizes and vibrant colors, the Iron Flask is not just a practical hydration solution but also a fashionable accessory. Stay hydrated in style with this exceptional water bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first one I bought was a 64oz jug because I was going through a transition from drinking things bad for my body to drinking water. I was first sold on the color but then after I still had ice in the jug after a full shift I had to buy one for my dad who works long hours outside. I bought him a 32-34oz and he absolutely loved it, it has a cool design (chose the black marble for him) it holds the same as his knock off yetis and it keeps his drinks cold! I bought my third one when I swapped jobs when I couldn't lug my jug around. It couldn't fit anywhere at my current job without being in the way so I bought a 24oz that could fit into the designated drink shelf. They're all great value for good insulation both hot and cold. I don't use some of the lids, I tend to prefer the straw on the jug cause it gets heavy and awkward to drink from the opening but the regular screw on lid for the 24oz cause it's easier to drink from the mouth of the cup.They're mostly leak proof unless you put carbonated drinks inside with the lip or straw attachment. But that's because it's a pressurized container at that point.The durability is great, I've dropped my 64oz a few times and it's still pristine. I haven't dropped my 24oz or anything so I'm sure it'd be alright too. I've seen some people's reviews where some of the attachments break but I haven't had that issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars rugged, looks good, fits cup holder
reviews.reviewText: rugged, looks good, fits cup holder also keeps the water cold for a long time.I printed my name on both of the flasks I bought in case I lost one. I must have left one of them at the gym - never got it back and no one called to say they had found it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, no leaks, beautiful colour
reviews.reviewText: This is my third iron flask - I only got a new one because I broke the lid of my old one (dropped it, was my fault). I love this water bottle - it’s a perfect size - not too big and not too small. I love that it’s thin and long, goes nicely in my bag’s side pocket. Keeps water very cold. Comes with 3 different lids - I personally prefer this one with the straw - easy to use during workout or driving. Only bad thing is it bruises pretty easily when it falls, and once it falls and dents on its base, it tends to lose stability and fall again. But if your not a klutz shouldn’t be a problem, and still it holds up for a good couple of years on a daily use. I absolutely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST water bottle ever!
reviews.reviewText: Love this water bottle. It keeps ice frozen for over 24 hours! It comes with 3 different lids, which is great. I like the one with the straw the best! Made very well, easy to carry, and fits in my cup holder in my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came just as described. The bottle is sturdy and keeps ice for over a day. It’s not heavy and the extra lids are very convenient.

I love that this bottle came with multiple lid styles. No leaks!! I even had this bottle rolling around my purse with no leaks. Kept water cold for hours. Cute colour options, was so hard to pick! Good purchase.

Está ya es mi tercera botella por Iron Flask. Obviamente me gusta la marca pero mi única queja con este modelo es con la tapa de cierre. Muchas veces creo que está bien cerrada y no. Me ha pasado en varias ocasiones que la dejo a mi lado ya sea en el asiento de copiloto de mi auto o en el sillón de mi sala y en cuanto la agarro para tomar, se siente muy ligera de peso y es cuando me doy cuenta que se ha tirado todo el agua dejando todo mojado dónde estaba. Es cuestión de fijar muy bien de que esté bien bien cerrada. Suena lógico ya se pero esto no me pasaba con el mismo tipo de tapa con otras modelos de botellas de la misma marca
Fue un regalo y están fascinados con el

Estéticamente es hermoso y muy funcional el agua dura fría muchas horas e incluso cuando se le pone hielo al agua, al día siguiente sigue estando fría lo pedí para mi pero al ver lo lindo que está mi mamá lo quiso 🤷🏻‍♀️😁😅
Es perfecto, tiene garantía de por vida, elempaque perfecto, accesorios perfectos, todo en excelente estado. Se ve duradero, funcional, me encantó!
